concept.title: 206.305 AVAILABILITY OF THE JUSTIFICATION.

conbody.p: See PGI 206.305 for further guidance on the requirements for preparing, obtaining approval, and posting justification and approval documents for contracts awarded using the authority of FAR 6.302-2.
